thread.section_title: ‘Huge explosion’ of lava and rocks at Mount Etna injures tourists and BBC crew – Metro
thread.title: ‘Huge explosion’ of lava and rocks at Mount Etna injures tourists and BBC crew
thread.title_full: ‘Huge explosion’ of lava and rocks at Mount Etna injures tourists and BBC crew

author: tmeyjes
title: ‘Huge explosion’ of lava and rocks at Mount Etna injures tourists and BBC crew
text:
Mount Etna spews lava during an eruption in the early hours of Thursday morning (AP Photo/Salvatore Allegra) A volcanic explosion at Mount Etna has injured at least 10 people after tourists and a BBC crew were showered with lava and rocks. 
The casualties, which included a 78-year-old woman, suffered head injuries, burns, cuts and bruises but none are thought to be serious.
At least six people were taken to hospitals in nearby Catania and Acireale hospitals, according to Il Corriere.
More to follow.
MORE: All bets are off for Prince Harry proposing to Meghan Markle this year 
MORE: Woman ‘repeatedly sexually assaulted’ on London bus on her way to work
